entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Audit and cleanup the generic math API docs #69694
    7.0.0
  • W^X concerns with C++/CLI #69691
    7.0.0
  • ECMA-335 addendum should mention that null managed pointers are legal #69690
  • Track removing workaround to not use pthread robust mutexes for named mutexes on arm32/arm64 Linux #69688
    8.0.0
  • ClientWebsocket KeepAliveInterval keeps spawning more keep alive messages in some cases #69684
  • [API Proposal]: Efficiently matching multiple strings. #69682
  • [wasm][aot] Test failure - `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.MarshalTests.MarshalPrimitivesToCS` #69681
  • Failures on Mono Android x64 Release @ Ubuntu.1804.Amd64.Android.29.Open on rolling build of runtime-extra-platforms #69678
  • [API Proposal]: Add AllBitsSet to the IBinaryNumber Interface #69676
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicStream #69675
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Add a hook to start an EventPipe Session from runtime startup #69674
    7.0.0
  • Compiler error when publishing a blazor wasm (MonoAOTCompiler: Unable to compile method 'bool System.DateTimeParse:Lex) #69671
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: WebSockets over HTTP/2 #69669
  • Suboptimal Implementation of Half to Single conversion #69667
  • A single box instruction is preventing JIT from inlining #69665
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: \"https://wrong.host.badssl.com/\", expectedErrors: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch) #69664
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetTotalPauseDuration/GetTotalPauseDuration.sh #69662
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\virtualstubdispatch\\bigvtbl\\bigvtbl_cs_d\\bigvtbl_cs_d.cmd #69661

Closed

  • Add rich type for reading X509 Authority Information Access #68792
    7.0.0
  • Does the LibraryImportGenerator work for csharp projects only or any? #69233
    7.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackFrameTests.Ctor_FNeedFileInfo #69154
  • P/Invoke string encoding doesn't work properly in some cases #69660
  • Vector test failures on tvos on the rolling build #1774196 #69424
  • Follow-up for Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() - tests and stack walk #69251
    7.0.0
  • JIT perf: Span.Slice(0, ...) emits unnecessary 64-bit extensions #69200
    7.0.0
  • Erratic behavior marshaling derived classes to native code #60803
    7.0.0
  • `BackgroundService` is started before `Host` is started. #69658
  • HTTP/3: RemoteCertificateValidationCallback to allow invalid TLS certification isn't working #68958
    7.0.0
  • Desktop: System.ConfigurationTests.SectionGroupsTests.SimpleSectionGroup failed with "System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" #21527
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException is not marked as [Serializable] #42154
    Future
  • string.LastIndexOf(char, int, int) doesn't work #69666
  • MAX_CONNECTION_STRING_LENGTH = 1024 too short for Azure OAuth Token #64940
  • Desktop: Tests under "MonoTests.System.Configuration.ConfigurationManagerTest" failed with "System.NullReferenceException" #21528
    Future
  • Assert - Type Too Big to log for ETW #6027
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix W^X executable memory releasing on Unix #69697
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable test with the correct path #69693
  • Disabling test that is hitting out of memory exceptions in some platforms #69692
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    area-Single-File
  • Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69687
    area-Single-File
  • [mono] Cleanup main.c/main-sgen.c split, unused glib functions, Apple compression etc #69686
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix handling of hardware exceptions in native code on Unix #69685
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove more uses of StringBuilderCache #69683
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] retrieve results from browser bench sample #69673
  • Enable W^X by default #69672
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting of DacpHeapSegmentData::highAllocMark on DAC side. #69670
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #69668
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Better createdump error messages #69663
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Don't fail the CI job if Firefox tests fail in `runtime-wasm` #69615
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add arm64 support for EnC #69679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exposing `Radix` and the remaining `Is*` generic-math APIs #69651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Limit AnalyzerLanguage in LibraryImportGenerator to C# #69680
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • JIT: redundant branch destructure dominating and/or #69291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Correct the behavior of Equals #69499
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Dispose of processes launched in host tests #69625
    test-bug, area-Host
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Use IntegralRange in fgOptimizeRelationalComparisonWithCasts #69247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NoTargets SDK and clean-up code #69597
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix native sourcelink support #69598
  • Use a better endpoint for backport workflows runs #69617
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rename and reenable test #69648
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Switch from malloc to stackAlloc for bindings invokes #69698
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added `--git_diff` option SPMI asm diffs #69572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add integer type discriminator support to System.Text.Json polymorphism #69326
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Optimization for "~x + 1" to "-x" (#69003) #69600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, needs-author-action
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Make superpmi.py collect work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use correct AOT annotation on JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverterFromAttribute #69520
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload restore fails when encountering solution folder #25592
  • The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: NotSignatureValid #25582

Closed

  • Send Hot Reload message from C# in own app to browser reload script #25466
  • [dotnet-watch] hot reload script injection should be more permisive. #25510

PullRequests

Created

  • Define 'DeploymentResponse' to parse Zip Deploy status response #25600
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1785499 #25599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respond to dotnet/runtime#69680 #25596

Merged

  • [6.0.3xx] Disable Microsoft.DN.Compatibility pkg #25597
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the netcoreapp2.1 and netcoreapp2.2 to the current framework #25039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1784305 #25567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Version Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility same as SDK #25590
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25522
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-watch] Fixes an infinite loop of reloads when the process fails to start #25533
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [dotnet-watch] Updates the request path to always be host relative #25534
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to make sure enums match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net3.1 to the current framework #24900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing flaky on MacOS #61474
  • Null Reference while accessing GlobalOptionService #61473
  • Move Static Members to another type overwrites existing file and code #61471
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61470
  • Convert switch statement to expression - incorrect 'OR' operator for fallthrough options #61468
  • Issue with "Avoid expression statements that implicitly ignore value" code style fixer #61467
  • In Intellisense, Parameter Descriptions Set to inheritdoc Concatenate Together #61466
  • Refactoring namespace removes this operator #61465
  • Add TargetFramework.Net70 with "numeric IntPtr" support #61463
    C# 11.0
  • Creating a value tuple with a non-existent field results in a confusing CS8619 #61462
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members as a type argument #61461
    C# 11.0
  • .editorconfig ignored when EnableDefaultItems = false #61458
  • Workspace failed with could not load "NuGet.Frameworks" error #61454

Closed

  • Disallow interfaces with abstract statics as type arguments #60606
    C# 11.0
  • [17.1.5] Improvements to the new "Base types/implemented interfaces" view ("inheritance margin"?) #61022
    Backlog
  • Confirm whether we would like to support use of static abstract methods declared in interfaces as operators in query expressions #53796
    C# 11.0
  • Implement LSP breakpoint placement request #59455
    17.3
  • Unable to add configuration item #61459
  • Peek Definition does not work with decompiled sources #23480
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix null ref for JS files #61472
    Area-IDE
  • Lazily produce semantic models in source generators #61469
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61460
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Update test to reflect enum behavior change #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • Update test to reflect new GetPublicKeyToken API behavior #61455
    Test

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary finalizer state handling from MethodToStateMachine… #61409
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update status for DIM and numeric IntPtr #61464
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update SDK to .NET 7 Preview 4 #61422
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow source link, embedded or decompiled source in Peek Definition #61427
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61475
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Add file paths to interactive buffers and documents to support LSP requests #61441
    Area-IDE, Area-Interactive, LSP
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address prototype comments #61436
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove parameter nullchecking feature #61397
    Area-Compilers
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
    Need Design Review
  • Log additional information from CopyRefAssembly #61384
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable CA1822 (make static) #61453
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting started with Blazor #41808
  • Blazor WASM SEO Performance Test Issue #41807
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #41806
  • Custom serialization with TextOutputFormatter is slow #41804
  • The Select Tag Helper not select an empty value when the property is null #41803
    Backlog
  • Missing project template translations for 'Do not use top-level statements' option in .NET 6.0.300 SDK #41802
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_AllowOrRequire_Available_Invalid_Refused and ClientCertificate_AllowOrRequire_Available_Invalid_Refused #41800
    Test failures
  • System.ArgumentException in RouteHandlerAnalyzer with Minimal API #41794

Closed

  • Dotnet Watch Run indefinitely reloads #39073
    6.0.5
  • `_framework/blazor-hotreload` 404 when running under subdirectory #40971
    6.0.5
  • Visual Studio for mac 运行 net6 mvc 时,The view '···' was not found. #40280
  • Antiforgery cookie randomly missing #41788
  • Pause and resume Blazor applications #27576
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server-side Loses Connection Upon Extended Phone Lock #41791

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-preview6 #41805
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5126f71` to `8d51dc5` #41796
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Support multiple calls to WithTags in WithOpenApi #41779
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add logging to M.E.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #41769
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border container not resizing correctly when window restored down inside a flex layout #7427
  • Documentation for Multi-Project setup. #7426
  • [BUG] GA Fix Source Generation for when Adding new Maui Pages as still using old Stack Layout and not VerticalStackLayout #7424
  • Using #IF when targeting windows isn't working #7423
  • Contacts API namespace conflicts on MacCatalyst and iOS #7421
  • Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry after updating VS to version 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7420
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Android shell when page becomes invisible #7417
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Maui RC3 + VS For Mac Rc2 + Android 31: Carousel stopped working. #7416
  • FlexLayout provides space for invisible children #7408

Closed

  • BlazorWebView: Uncaught SyntaxError: Identifier 'channel' has already been declared. #7392
    .NET 7
  • .NET 7 Preview 4 install breaks RC3 install experience #7422
  • The manifest package for 'ios' could not be found in any of the expected NuGet sources #7310
  • Image takes more space than needed if RequiredWidth is not set #5438
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CheckBox has default (empty) padding on Windows platform (Mac has no padding) #7352
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Crash using ScrollTo with a grouped ListView #7145
  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #7073
  • Grid RowDefinition Height Binding not working #4609
    6.0.300-servicing
  • BlazorWebView on iOS uses APIs that require iOS 11 or newer #6078
    6.0.300
  • RTL is not working in AbsoluteLayout #6540
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] In multi-dimensional Column Grid, content aligned with VerticalOptions does not align unless its height is set. #2000
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Full Screen in Windows Platform #7378
  • [iOS] Build Action "SceneKitAsset" #7405
  • Provide a compiled version of FlexEnums and FlowDirection #6547
  • MainActivity's OnCreate throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException #7195
  • WinUI Touch keyboard does not open on Windows 10 (Tablet mode) #7361
  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented- not working in runtime #7398
  • Page is not transient when used as ShellContent #7329
  • Hot Restart (iOS) doesn't succeed with local device #7384
  • Adding more than 16 controls on a page makes the TAB order wrong in Windows. #7395

PullRequests

Created

  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Revert "[Android] Fix crash removing items in ListView" #7418
    area/ListView
  • Fix swapping root page from Shell to Non Shell #7415
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fixed crash using Path in ControlTemplate ContentView #7412
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, fatal

Merged

  • Remove the padding around checkboxes #7379
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Android] Fix crash removing items in ListView #7411
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, fatal, area/ListView
  • [Windows] Fix grouped ListView ScrollTo crash #7413
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, fatal, area/ListView
  • [Housekeeping] Added ImageButton sample using VisualStateManager #7296
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Ensure that Grid is propagating the BindingContext to the row/col definitions #7301
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix RTL in AbsoluteLayout #7309
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Allow the image handler to measure more accurately WRT aspect ratio #7389
  • [X] Add compiled converters #7245
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • Fix BlazorWebView disposal #7349
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs (Android only edition) #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [X] simpilfy and avoid duplication in conversion #7143
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow specifying value converter instance in ConfigureConventions #28085
  • exclude LazyLoader when use System.Text.Json #28083
  • Environment-specific Data Seeding #28082
  • Is RetriesOnFailure on the IExecutionStrategy interface poorly named or even misleading? #28079
  • How to use RegexMatch in EF Core C# #28078
  • Could queries with navigation properties not produce joins if using only primary keys? #28077

Closed

  • Migrations containing strings with many line-breaks will truncate strings silently #27206
    7.0.0
  • Update optional dependents message to indicate non-null value rather than non-default #26800
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-preview6 #28087
    area-infrastructure
  • add support for System.Text.Json not including LazyLoader #28084

Merged

  • Add more cast nodes in multi-line breaks during migrations #28064
    auto-merge
  • Update exception message for optional dependent without identifying p… #28086
    auto-merge
  • Improve SQL Server IndexOf translation and change tests to use Where #28031

Updated

  • SqlServer: Throw for split query with skip without order by #28056

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Unable to build, missing System.IO.Pipes.AccessControl #13855

PullRequests

Updated

  • Enable the sdk and installer repos in source-build #13846
